txt.en: Aid the cooks of Thorin's Hall to keep the cook-fires burning while they make hard tack for an expedition under the mountains.
Aid the cooks of Thorin's Hall to keep the cook-fires burning while they make hard tack for an expedition under the mountains.
Aid the cooks of Thorin's Hall to keep the cook-fires burning while they make hard tack for an expedition under the mountains.
Speak with the Coordinator at the Thorin's Hall event space
Earn Thorin's Hall Commendations - Tier III ([placeholder]/5)
Aid the cooks of Thorin's Hall to keep the cook-fires burning while they make hard tack for an expedition under the mountains.
You exceeded expectations and performed feats of near perfection. You should visit the coordinator and speak to them for final acknowledgment.
You earned Tier III Prospector Rewards ([placeholder]/5)
Speak with the Coordinator at the Thorin's Hall event space
<rgb=#ff0000>Hard Tack at Thorin's Hall ends</rgb>

'An amazing accomplishment. Your support and interaction with the community allowed the cooks to succeed in creating enough hard tack to support our expedition for several days.\n\n'Please accept this reward for your effort.'
Speak with the Coordinator at the Thorin's Hall event space
Earn Thorin's Hall Commendations - Tier IV ([placeholder]/5)
Hard Tack of Thorin's Hall has ended

'An amazing accomplishment. Your support and interaction with the community allowed the cooks to succeed in creating enough hard tack to support our expedition for several days.\n\n'Please accept this reward for your effort.'
You earned Tier IV Prospector Rewards ([placeholder]/5)
Cooking large amounts of hard tack takes a full community effort. As a prospector, you are well-suited to assist the dwarfs and reap the rewards for your assistance.
You earned Tier I Prospector Rewards ([placeholder]/5)

'Greetings! I can tell by the callouses on your hands and the definition of your arms you swing a pickaxe. Your arrival is most fortuitous. We are making hard tack. We are making a large batch to assist in an expedition of dwarves delving deeper into the mountains.

'We need able bodies to find the ever-burning ore in these halls to keep the cook-fires burning. There is much to do and you will be rewarded for your efforts.'

<rgb=#00FF00>Accepting this quest will lock you out of accepting the Assist or Cook Quests in the Hard Tack of Thorin's Hall Event.</rgb>\q
Earn Thorin's Hall Commendations - Tier I ([placeholder]/5)
You earned Tier II Prospector Rewards ([placeholder]/5)
Earn Thorin's Hall Commendations - Tier II ([placeholder]/5)
Hard Tack Event: Prospecting
